ai-patthana16.40:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.40:0.3_0: for those things are true, and on the path leading to the object.
ai-patthana16.40:1.1_0: for sure path does not arise with the path, nor does the cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.40:2.1_0: or reasoning the teaching, not for the sake of path, or for the sake of path, nor for the sake of a reason.
